attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As 88% of the infections of Bovine Tuberculosis to Cattle is from cattle and as a Vaccine for them is expected by 2013/15, We petition the Government Not to cull Badgers

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not Cull Badgers"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18847


Prime Minister's Office
